sourcesContent:
import "./styles/home.css" import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function HomePage(props){ return(

{props.data.backgroundBoxOne.title}

{props.data.backgroundBoxOne.category} / {props.data.backgroundBoxOne.date}

{props.data.backgroundBoxTwo.title}

{props.data.backgroundBoxTwo.category} / {props.data.backgroundBoxTwo.date}

{props.data.backgroundBoxThree.title}

{props.data.backgroundBoxThree.category} / {props.data.backgroundBoxThree.date}

Latest in sports!

{props.data.sportsLatest.map(items=>(

{items.title}

{items.abstract}

{items.category} / {items.date}

))}

Latest in Hollywood!

{ props.data.latestHollywood.map(items=>(

{items.title}

{items.abstract}

{items.category}/ {items.date}

)) }

Top posts

{ props.data.topLatestHollywood.map(items=>(

{items.title}

{items.category}/ {items.date}

)) }

Latest in fitness!

{props.data.latestFitness.map(items=>(

{items.title}

{items.abstract}

{items.category} / {items.date}

))}
) } export default HomePage
